content.en: Efficient Association Mining: Researchers have been exploring various ways to improve the efficiency and privacy of mining association rules in distributed databases. They have proposed algorithms such as the DMA algorithm, a methodology to reduce communication costs, a privacy-preserving algorithm, and a binary coding mapping relation algorithm. These algorithms aim to make association rule mining more efficient, reduce communication overhead, prevent collusion, and minimize data leakage in distributed environments.
content.da: Effektiv Associeringsminering: Forskere har udforsket forskellige måder at forbedre effektiviteten og privatlivets fred ved minering af associeringsregler i distribuerede databaser. De har foreslået algoritmer som DMA-algoritmen, en metode til at reducere kommunikationsomkostninger, en privatlivsbevarende algoritme og en binær kodekortlægningsrelation-algoritme. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at gøre associeringsregelminering mere effektiv, reducere kommunikationsoverhead, forhindre sammensværgelser og minimere dataudslip i distribuerede miljøer.
